name: Kong Rage 3D - City Attack
description:
A new era of destruction and chaos starts. Huge Gorilla monster attacks the city.
Help the monster to destroy all buildings;
Crash everything on your way;
Fight against tanks and hunters;
Defeat all the humans.

HOW TO PLAY: Tap the buttons left and right to run. Fight against tanks and tap the button in the right corner of the screen to hit.

Control the gorilla: make your gorilla run, jump, crush and bring as much chaos into the city as possible.

Key features of Kong Rage 3D:
- only three buttons to destruct the whole city
- crash buildings to get more points
- ralistic physics of angry monkey
- dangerous enemies to fight with
- exciting destruction game consisting of various levels!

Play one of the most enjoyable and impressing destruction & killing games, but stay alert, for the gorilla hunters are on their way!
